Original:
難得在新北市找到一家稱的上水準的酒吧
撇開餐點不說
純粹評論調酒部分，基本上是不輸北市一級戰區的bar
這個一杯自創調酒座落在350-400區間其實不過分

我個人一直很喜歡坐在bar檯與調酒師聊天
如果各位朋友願意了解調酒文化
那您真的來對地方，
這家店是很樂於分享各種調酒知識與文化的

基本上我從最輕的酒類喝到最重的酒類
沒有一杯是對不起價格的
各有獨特的特色
每年也會更換酒單
非常推薦闔家聚餐、朋友聚會、感情問題或生活疑難病症，都適合在這待上一晚。
EN:
It is rare to find a high -level bar in New Taipei City
Don't talk about the meal
Purely commented that the alcoholic section is basically not lost to BAR in the first -class war zone in Beishi
This cup of self-made bartender is actually not excessive in the 350-400 range

I have always liked to sit on Bar platform to chat with the bartender
If you are willing to understand the alcoholic culture
Then you really come to the place,
This shop is very happy to share all kinds of alcoholic knowledge and culture

Basically, I drink from the lightest wine to the heaviest wine
No cup is sorry for the price
Each with unique characteristics
The wine list will be replaced every year
It is very recommended that the family dinner, friends gathering, emotional problems, or difficult life are suitable for staying one night.

Original:
捷運幸褔站步行2分鐘就可以到的村餐酒館，提供給食客夜間溫暖，餐點包含前菜、主食、滷味、炸物、調酒、甜點跟咖啡，讓甜點控跟咖啡控在夜晚也能讓身心得到滿足🥰

此次點
👍牛腱佐牛香醬 NT220：
牛腱花紋漂亮，也吃起來有膠質又不黏牙，牛香醬讓風味更提升~很下酒菜的一道✨

👍鳳爪&煙燻豬耳朵 NT180：
沒有骨頭的鳳爪一吃就會愛上，Q彈口感是膠質補給站，煙燻豬耳朵油亮有光澤，兩者配著調酒進食，都很適合🤤

👍滷味拼盤 NT350：
澎湃的滷味小船，滷的超入味的豆干、百頁豆腐、甜不辣、丸子跟雞翅雞腿，會一口接一口停不下來🤤

👍壽喜燒牛蓋飯 NT300：
壽喜燒牛肉片吃起來軟嫩細緻，醬汁有蔬菜的清爽跟甜味，白飯吸滿醬汁，味蕾會被驚艷到~

饗吃海鮮炒泡麵 NT200：
多種海鮮組合而成，底下為乾爽的公仔麵，麵體不會像外面的炒泡麵一樣軟爛，很有自己的特色~

👍黃金鳳尾蝦 NT220：
像派大星的擺盤，熱騰騰的炸物~外層超級酥脆，內裡的鳳尾蝦混著麵衣，味道像極了大顆的章魚小丸子，五隻分著吃，十分過癮~

👍古早味五香炸雞 NT280：
濃厚熟悉的鹹甜醬裹住多汁的炸雞，吃起來完全不膩口，鮮嫩雞肉超美味，完全是饗宴等級🤭

甜點🍰
👍巧克力堅果蛋糕 NT160：
像是布朗尼的巧克力蛋糕，外層烤的焦脆，內裡綿密，苦甜的巧克力很對我的胃，喜歡🤎
村式核桃派 NT180：
滿滿的核桃緊密堆疊，堅果香十足，營養滿分！

調酒🍸
👍思念了玫 NT330：
琴酒/巨峰葡萄🍇/玫瑰🌹，少女肯定喜歡的一款，上層綿密泡泡中縈繞濃濃的玫瑰香，葡萄的酸甜是典雅又不失俏皮，層次豐富，我喜歡的一款！

👍椰芒一夏 NT350：
四季春萊姆酒/芒果🥭/椰奶🥥，芒果香氣交織椰奶風味，擠上鮮奶油跟薄荷裝飾，後勁有酒感，夏天首選！

👍花蜜波特 NT380：
烏龍🍵/桂花/蜂蜜🍯，低調的一款白酒，素淨但層次疊加起來挺特別，偏酸些卻可以喝出蜂蜜甜，淡淡的桂花香提味，很別緻~

村 NT380：
檸檬馬鞭草琴酒/Fernet Hunter/Lillet/左手香🌿，偏草本的調酒，推薦給男性或喜歡酒感重的人！

是新莊喝酒的好去處，適合小酌放鬆，餐點美味，讓身心更享受了~

⭐若有興趣可追蹤IG：lason_ate_food，拉送文帶你一起品嚐美食🤝
EN:
MRT Xingyu Station can go to the village dining tavern for 2 minutes, which can be warm to diners at night. The meals include pre -dishes, staple food, marina, fried, bartender, desserts and coffee, so that dessert control and coffee control at night also at night. Can satisfy the body and mind 得

This time
Niu Niu tendon Sa Niu Xiang Sauce NT220:
The beef tendon pattern is beautiful, and it tastes glue and does not stick to teeth. Niu Xiang sauce makes the flavor more improved ~ It is a lot of wine and vegetables.

烟 熏 & smoked pig ear NT180:
The phoenix claws without bones will fall in love with it. The Q elastic taste is a glue supply station. The smoky pig ears are bright and shiny.

N Lochi platter NT350:
The surging marinated boat, the dry -flavored soybean, the hundred pages of tofu, the sweet and not spicy, the meatballs and the chicken and chicken legs, the bite will not stop.

盖 👍 👍 👍 👍 👍 NT300:

A variety of seafood combination is made of dry doll noodles underneath. The facade will not be as soft as fried noodles outside. It has its own characteristics ~

Like Pai Daxing's plate, the hot fried objects ~ the outer layer is super crispy, the inside of the inside is mixed with noodles, and the taste is like a large octopus small ball.

炸 👍 👍 👍 👍 fried chicken nt280:
The thick and familiar salty sweet sauce wraps the juicy fried chicken. It tastes completely not greasy. The tender chicken is super delicious, which is completely feast level 🤭

Chocolate Nut Cake NT160:
Like Brownie's chocolate cake, the outer layer is baked, the inside is dense, and the bitter sweet chocolate is very good at my stomach, I like it

The full walnut is tightly stacked, the nut is full of fragrance, and the nutrition is full!

Bartender 🍸
I miss the rose nt330:
Qinjiu/Jufeng Grape 🍇/Rose 🌹, the girl must like the one that the upper layer is lingering the strong rose fragrance. The sweet and sour grapes are elegant and playful, rich in layers, one I like!

N Coconut Mang Yixia NT350:
The four seasons of spring Lim/Mango 🥭/coconut milk, mango aroma intertwined coconut milk flavor, squeezing fresh cream and mint decoration, the stamina has wine, the first choice in summer!

3 3 honey Potter NT380:
Oolong/osmanthus/honey, a low -key liquor, is well -cleaned, is very special. It can be sour but can drink sweet honey.

Village NT380:
Lemon whip grass piano wine/fernet hunter/lillet/left -hand fragrant, bartender with a partial herbal, recommend it to men or people who like alcohol!

It is a good place for Xinzhuang to drink. It is suitable for relaxation, delicious meals, and enjoying the body and mind ~

Original: 一家不容錯過的餐酒館，提供獨特的自然香料調酒和精選美食。這裡的環境兼具時尚與自然，是放鬆身心的絕佳去處。不論是想要享受一杯精心調配的特色酒，還是品嘗創意菜餚，這裡都能滿足您的需求。酒館以「木」為設計主題，營造出溫馨舒適的氛圍，非常適合朋友小聚或是獨自前來放鬆。
EN: A tavern that cannot be missed provides unique natural spices and sobering and selected food.The environment here has both fashion and nature, which is an excellent place to relax.Whether you want to enjoy a cup of carefully prepared special wine or taste creative dishes, you can meet your needs here.Taking the "wood" as the design theme, the tavern creates a warm and comfortable atmosphere, which is very suitable for friends to gather or relax alone.

嘿做為新莊人很感謝這裡開了間有質感的好店，不用每次都要大老遠跑台北喝哈哈😌

溫馨自在的氛圍搭配上有水準的調酒與餐點相信喜愛小酌的人來這一定會有很值得的體驗

這次與女友來慶祝很開心能夠有這樣美好的經驗，下次絕對要帶三五好友來玩，期待未來的二三四五訪🍸
EN:
Hey, as a Xinzhuang, thank you very much for opening a good texture here. No need to run away from Taipei to drink haha.

The warm and comfortable atmosphere is matched with standard bartending and meals. I believe that people who love drinking will come here. This will definitely have a worthy experience

This time I came to celebrate with my girlfriend to be very happy to have such a good experience. I will definitely bring three or five friends to play next time.

EN:
Blooming is delicious, fried instant noodles are delicious,
But the store is too small, it feels crowded when it is full. The noisy sound and the music are too loud, but it is not very comfortable and relaxed.

Original:
這間跟Wood Bistro是同一個老闆
菜單長得還蠻像😂但有些微差異
比如一樣都是滷味拼盤🧆Village Bistro味道上比較沒有那麼重口味、是偏甜的
雖然來餐酒館點牛肉麵🍜好像有點突兀
但對於偏向中式菜色的Village Bistro來說好像也還好🤭
牛肉麵肉質軟嫩🐮完全不會柴👍超好吃
麵條用的是粗麵～我自己偏好又粗又寬的麵條🥵
另一個主食選ㄉ是壽喜燒牛肉蓋飯🍱也很讚
建議來的話兩種主餐都可以點✅然後交換吃
整體來說菜色口味都偏重
比較推薦的點法是多人一起來🫶🏻然後菜色不要重複
黃金鳳尾蝦也很厲害🦐滿滿ㄉ蝦漿包裹整隻蝦
冰鎮蜜桃紅茶超級好喝🍹很合我們的胃口
如果平常不愛重口味的🥺可以點鮮奶茶🧋
喝完覺得還是水果茶更適合我一點😝
這次點的Mojito無酒精特調也很讚💯
好喝程度跟水果茶不相上下.ᐟ.ᐟ推推
最後用好吃巧克力堅果蛋糕🍫收尾很滿足😌
但因為我們急著走的關係
請餐廳提早幫我們出餐🍴所以蛋糕烤得有點過焦XD
吃起來有一種餅乾的感覺🍪哈哈哈哈
EN:
This is the same boss as Wood Bistro
The menu looks quite like 有 but a little bit different
Like the same, it is the flavor of Payon Packs 🧆Village Bistro. It is less heavy and sweet.
Although the beef noodles come to the dining tavern, it seems a bit abrupt
But for Village Bistro, which is biased towards Chinese dishes, it seems that it is also good.
Beef noodles are soft and tender 全 全 👍 👍 👍 👍 👍 👍 👍 👍 is super delicious
The noodles are thick noodles ~ My own preferences, thick and wide noodles 🥵
Another staple food selection is Shouxi roasted beef rice rice.
If you recommend it, you can order both the main meals and then exchange it.
On the whole
The more recommended point is that many people come together and do not repeat the dishes
Golden phoenix shrimp is also very powerful.
Frozen peach black tea is super delicious 🍹 is very good for our appetite
If you usually do n’t like heavy taste 爱, you can order fresh milk tea 🧋 🧋
After drinking, I still feel that fruit tea is more suitable for me a little bit 😝
Mojito's alcoholic specialty this time is also very good.
The degree of deliciousness is comparable to fruit tea .ᐟ.ᐟ push push
Finally, use delicious chocolate nut cake 🍫 to end very satisfied 😌
But because we are in a hurry
Ask the restaurant to help us go out early.
It feels like a biscuits 🍪 hahahahaha
